title: How Great Thou Art
lyrics: How Great Thou Art
Stuart Wesley Keene Hine Tempo - 60 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
O Lord my God when I in awesome wonder
Consid - er all the works Thy hands hath made
(worlds Thy hands have)
I see the stars I hear the mighty thunder
(rolling)
Thy pow'r through - out the uni - verse dis - played
CHORUS
Then sings my soul my Sav - iour God to Thee
How great Thou art how great Thou art
Then sings my soul my Sav - iour God to Thee
How great Thou art how great Thou art
VERSE 2
When through the woods and for - est glades I wander
And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees
When I look down from loft - y mountain grandeur
And hear the brook and feel the gen - tle breeze
VERSE 3
And when I think that God His Son not sparing
Sent Him to die I scarce can take it in
That on the cross my bur - den gladly bearing
He bled and died to take a - way my sin
VERSE 4
When Christ shall come with shout of acclamation
And take me home what joy shall fill my heart
Then shall I bow in humb - le adoration
And there pro - claim my God how great Thou art
CCLI Song # 14181
